item.title: I Attended ng-conf 2016. Yay!
item.description: This week I attended ng-conf for the first time. Last year I tried to get tickets in the lottery but ended up watching online with most everyone else. Of course, I rewatched several of the sessions several times trying to drain every drop of knowledge from these presenters. This year I took up egghead.io on their “buy a workshop ticket and you can buy a conference ticket instead of trying to get a lottery ticket” offer.
